"Under the Volcano" is a classic movie directed by Alfred Hitchcock. The film tells the story of two English couples, one from London and the other from Oxford. The couple from London,即 Dr. and Mrs. Markham, have just returned to London after several years away in America. Their son, Peter Markham, has recently graduated from college in America.
On the other hand, the couple from Oxford, including their daughter Louise Markham, are currently visiting England with their children.
